metadata.description: NPC backgrounds and occupations for character generation with shop economy system
notes: Backgrounds represent past/history (affects starting conditions, shop modifiers, unique items)
Occupations represent current job (affects skills/gold/shop inventory/economy)
NPCs can have both background AND occupation (e.g., 'Noble-born Blacksmith')
Shop system: hybrid (core items always available + dynamic items refresh daily)
Player economy: limited merchant gold, 7-day item decay, quality-based pricing
Quality pricing: (100 / AccumulatedRarityWeight) * basePrice (lower rarity = rarer = expensive)
Background modifiers: Small bonuses (+10% quality) + specialization hints + unique items
Shop chance: 0.0 to 1.0 (e.g., 0.8 = 80% of NPCs with this occupation have shops)
No special privileges but no social stigma
